item.title: in Bb 2.0 - a collaborative music/spoken word project
item.description:
in Bb 2.0 - a collaborative music/spoken word project

In Bb 2.0 is a collaborative music and spoken word project conceived by Darren Solomon and developed with contributions from users.

item.title: James Brown on David Letterman
item.description:
James Brown on David Letterman

The Godfather of Soul makes an appearance on the old "Late Night with David Letterman" on July 12, 1982. This is the best TV performance I've ever seen. I've never seen a TV audience respond like this. Paul Shaffer and the fellas proved they really were The World's Most Dangerous Band this night!

item.title: Amanda Penecale and the Lost Sleep Kickstarter!
item.description:
Amanda Penecale and the Lost Sleep Kickstarter!

I've been fortunate enough to recently work with some great friends on a new folk/indie/americana project called Amanda Penecale and the Lost Sleep. Â Amanda just released a Kickstarter for an EP that we'd like to put out this spring, and we would really appreciate if you'd consider supporting the project!
